solution_line_template: There are {hands_excluding_peter} + {peter_hands} of Peter's hands = <<{hands_excluding_peter}+{peter_hands}={total_hands}>>{total_hands} hands in Peter's class including his
There are {total_hands} hands / {hands_per_student} hands per student = <<{total_hands}/{hands_per_student}={total_students}>>{total_students} students
